summary:
Adds a stand-alone armour to the world of Skyrim, based on the witcher 2 models.
Includes Male & Female versions
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange][size=4]WezEllison Mercenary\'s Tabard[/size][/color]

[color=red][size=3]Changelog Version 1.03
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]
Fixed issue where the armour wasn\'t enchantable
Fixed issue where NPC\'s would think you were naked
Added armour to it\'s own set, it should now work with perks

[color=red][size=3]Changelog Version 1.02
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]
Fixed issue with texture not showing for some people in first person
Fixed the smithing category, it now all shows up under steel
Added inventory model for boots
Added an unarmoured version that\'s all crafted under leather
Added new texture for unarmoured version, blue instead of red

[color=red][size=3]Changelog Version 1.01
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]
Fixed Gloves not being able to be tempered/enchanted
Fixed issue with player becoming bald whilst wearing bandana


[color=lime][size=3]*Bribes* I\'ll give kudos to players who upload some user images of you using the armour![/size][/color]


[color=orange][size=3]Modders make these to make the game more enjoyable for you, All I ask for is some amount of feedback and if you like what you see please Endorse to show your appreciation, thankyou.[/size][/color]


[color=yellow][size=2]This video is an old version of the mod[/size][/color]
[youtube]_9Uc5Vk5dG8[/youtube]
[color=yellow][size=2]THANKS TO EXOSHINOIZME FOR THE VIDEO[/size][/color]

[color=lime][size=3]WHY HAVE YOU DONE THIS?[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------
I wanted something that defines my character & who he is, I was using \"Wanderer Surcoat\" for a few days & it was that peice of armour that was the inspiration to make my own version.

The armour comes in both male & female.

The armour is crafted under steel, there\'s also a cloth variant (unarmoured) for you mages & monks. The cloth variant is crafted under leather & also features a different texture.

[color=lime][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------
Extract the contents into your Skyrim directory, click yes to overwrite. Enable the MercenaryTabard.esp in your preferred launcher.

[color=Red][size=3]BUGS/KNOWN ISSUES[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------
There\'s no world model for the boots - don\'t drop them.

[color=Red][size=3]INCOMPATABILITIES[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------
Nothing as far as I\'m aware.

[color=yellow][size=3]CREDITS[/size][/color]
----------------------------------------------------
LordOfWar for the original porting and rigging of the armour used
TH3WICK3D1 for allowing the use of his viper armour
CDProjekt for allowing the porting of their models from The Witcher 2
Bethesda Softworks for Skyrim and the Creation Kit 
AzarelHrafin for inspiring me to make this
author: WezEllison
